synopsis.text: Susanoo aliens have set their sights on Earth, and the once vibrant Kabucki-cho lies in ruins after a devastating war. The owner of the lingerie pub Pallion has relocated to Akihabara, opening New Papillion in this bustling district. Amidst the chaos, Tsubomi and her fellow warriors, Anne and Shizuku, have lost their memories and started anew in Akihabara. As the Susanoo unleash monstrous UMAs upon the city, Rama the cat emerges as an unlikely ally. By helping Tsubomi and her friends regain their memories, they become the Lingerie Soldiers, Earth's last line of defense against these otherworldly invaders. With time running out, can the Lingerie Soldiers rise to the challenge and save Akihabara from impending doom?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
